title: Marnie Simpson and Casey Johnson have baby boy after she was induced
text:
Marnie Simpson has welcomed her first child with Casey Johnson.

The Geordie Shore star, 27, revealed on Tuesday that she is now the proud mother of a baby boy after passing her due date by 12 days.

The star's representative told OK! magazine: 'Marnie gave birth to a beautiful baby boy yesterday afternoon. Mother and son are both doing well.'

Proud new parents: Marnie Simpson has welcomed her first child with Casey Johnson. The Geordie Shore star, 27, revealed on Tuesday she is now the proud mother of a baby boy

Marnie was forced to book in for an induction after being left feeling 'horrific in so many ways' as she awaited the arrival of her baby.

The starlet has been documenting her pregnancy on social media and has been candid about the discomfort of surpassing her due date.

Last week, in an Instagram message shared alongside a photo of herself with Casey, 24, she wrote: 'So blessed to have this human in my life. I've suffered so badly the last week as I'm now ten days over due and I have to admit it's tough.

'Words can't explain the discomfort, but generally wouldn't be able to get through it without you. Love you so much. I'm so lucky to have you by my side.'

Support: Marnie has been documenting her pregnancy on social media and has been candid about the discomfort of surpassing her due date

Adding that she had booked her induction, she continued: 'This little guy is coming whether he likes it or not.'

Marnie was due to give birth on October 16, and said in August she couldn't wait for her son to arrive.

She shared: 'In the beginning I suffered with nausea, but since getting past 20 weeks I've been a lot better.

'Considering how bad some people's pregnancies are, I think it's been alright. I feel so swollen and bloated, I can't wait for him to arrive now.'

Ouch: Marnie was forced to book in for an induction after being left feeling 'horrific in so many ways' as she awaited the arrival of her baby

The couple announced they were expecting their first child in April, following fears over Marnie's fertility.

Speaking to OK! magazine, the former party girl admitted that she thought motherhood was something that might never happen for her because of previous 'alcohol abuse'.

X Factor star Casey also revealed his excitement over their impending parenthood, saying: 'I don't think you're ever ready until it happens, but we're so excited. It feels amazing.'

Marnie and Casey met on celebrity dating show Single AF in late 2017 and bought a house together after just eight months of dating.

The couple experienced their fair share of ups and downs, and were hit with a series of split rumours, but by September 2018 they were back on track and vowed to start a family soon.
description: The Geordie Shore star, 27, revealed on Tuesday that she and X Factor boyfriend Casey, 24, are now the proud parents of a baby boy after Marnie passed her due date by 12 days.
